data.description:
From the developers of the critically-acclaimed A Fisherman’s Tale, embark on a thrilling adventure mixing action, puzzle and mystery. Solve the mysterious murder of best-selling gamebook author Jack Stevenson by diving into the fantastical worlds of his Fiendish Fates© series. 

**EXPERIENCE A WIDE VARIETY OF ACTION & PUZZLE GAMEPLAY** 

Travel through 3 worlds from Jack’s book series, each featuring different themes and gameplays:
- Magical sword in hand, slash your way through the necromantic Army of Evil, led by the demonic Grey Knight.
- In Butchers of Orion, use your mind-powers and body-hopping abilities to escape the spaceship of the life-sucking Lady Oriana and her drones.
- Blast the corrupt guards of Sheriff Cassidy’s wasteland penitentiary with your shock-hand and trusty cyber-shooter in Prisoner of the Cyberhounds.

**DISCOVER/UNVEIL THE MYSTERY OF THE AUTHOR’S DEATH**

Witness Jack Stevenson’s rise and fall, as you explore his final and most intimate work.
Discover clues, secrets and notes to decipher the story behind the books and the true meaning of your journey through Jack’s fictional worlds.

**PREPARE FOR A MIND-BENDING JOURNEY**

Jack’s final masterpiece couldn’t be complete without one of his world-famous twists. But he never expected this twist: the death of the author! Discover Jack’s true killer by exploring the fantastical worlds of his gamebook series! Escape his stories’ perils through cracks in between the worlds!

Are you ready, adventurer? Your journey starts here!
